XMVP.Story: { "title": "Puberty Panic", "synopsis": "A hopelessly horny teenager's inner life is visualized as a Vegas show, while his dysfunctional family provides a constant stream of awkwardness and questionable life choices.", "characters": [ "Nicky Twitch", "Jolene Twitch", "Ethel Twisp", "Gerry Globnar", "Gary Twisp", "Larney", "Ms. Snotron" ], "theme": "Satire" }
